column4: Can someone help me enable the graphics driver in Restricted Drivers Manager? It does not work!
Can someone help me enable the graphics driver in Restricted Drivers Manager? It does not work

Can someone help me enable the graphics driver in Restricted Drivers Manager? It does not work.. I have a geforce fx5200 card and it says: "The software source for the package nvidia-glx-new is not enabled"...
make sure you have the restrcicted repository enabled
